channel.title: physical modeling on jamesm.blog
channel.description: Recent content in physical modeling on jamesm.blog

item.title: Music Production: Physical Modeling Synths
item.description: Applied Acoustics Systems Chromaphone - creative synthesis with real-life acoustic character Ultra Analog VA-3 - performs as a unique and powerful synth that is fast, easy, and remarkably versatile Arturia Piano V - finest array of production-worthy pianos Expressive E imagine - a playful world of unknown acoustic sounds Modartt Pianoteq - award-winning virtual instrument Physical Audio Derailer - physical modelling instrument plugin built from mathematical models of strings, bars and spring connection elements Preparation - based on mathematical modelling of 2 basic elements; strings which can be configured as bars, and a rattling element Rhizomatic Plasmonic - captures the complex acoustic resonances of Physical Modeling, expands on it with more familiar elements of Subtractive Synthesis, and adds a few unique twists
item.content:encoded:
• Applied Acoustics Systems
    • Chromaphone - creative synthesis with real-life acoustic character
    • Ultra Analog VA-3 - performs as a unique and powerful synth that is fast, easy, and remarkably versatile
  • Arturia
    • Piano V - finest array of production-worthy pianos
  • Expressive E
    • imagine - a playful world of unknown acoustic sounds
  • Modartt
    • Pianoteq - award-winning virtual instrument
  • Physical Audio
    • Derailer - physical modelling instrument plugin built from mathematical models of strings, bars and spring connection elements
    • Preparation - based on mathematical modelling of 2 basic elements; strings which can be configured as bars, and a rattling element
  • Rhizomatic
    • Plasmonic - captures the complex acoustic resonances of Physical Modeling, expands on it with more familiar elements of Subtractive Synthesis, and adds a few unique twists
